attributes.title: Got it

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with the latest on what our dictator is doing ❤️ Yet once I downloaded it CRAZY things started happening. Not only did the app just keep showing Trump 2020 wherever I clicked, but it started trying to BRAINWASH me. There were voices, they started off like a whisper, but the longer I had the app the louder they got! Within 10 minutes they were SCREAMING at me TRUMP 2020! Then other crazy things started happening in my life that turned that day into the worst day ever! I decided to go on a bike ride to try to clear my head but that’s when things got crazy! I went into a neighborhood and came out the other side next to a building, I then decided to go home and went through the same neighborhood, the same way I came and then I came out NEXT TO THE SAME BUILDING! Now this may not sound that crazy but the next part will blow your mind! So I was stuck in this neighborhood, no way out when something above caught my eye. It was a UFO, so I tried getting away when Badgers with machine guns came running at me! They kept repeating TRUMP 2020! TRUMP 2020! I was in such a state of shock I completely blacked out. I can’t remember a thing, it wasn’t until later when I looked at my phone and the Trump app was gone that I realized all of my misfortune was from downloading this app. I will NEVER download this app again! It’s awful and must be taken down! Since deleting this app my life has been great :)
attributes.title: BADGERS WITH MACHINE GUNS WILL COME AFTER YOU IF YOU DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
